Detailed Description

CSL_RingAccCfg contains information to configure the ring accelerator.

Field Documentation

bool CSL_RingAccCfg::bTraceSupported

Indicates if trace functionality is supported in this ring accelerator configuration

uint32_t CSL_RingAccCfg::maxMonitors

Maximum number of monitors supported in this ring accelerator configuration

Maximum number of rings supported in this ring accelerator configuration
